TopicTitle: Mod Idea: Rover Wheels on Kal controler

Articles.Content:
would it be possible to bind the throttle on the rover wheels to a KAL controler or even just the new action groups?

would something need to added via Module manager patch or would it require a custom plugin?

There was a post by Snark showing how to add a field to allow binding to an axis group - this was plugin code for the module responsible for the action. This leads me to believe it would require a rewrite of the plugin for the wheels if the ability isn't already programed in. Shadowmage's KSPWheel is the only wheel module I know of other than Squad's - don't know if it supports this or not.
